name: Woes of the White Woods
text: Special Summon 1 "White Woods" monster from your hand or Deck, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Synchro Summon 1 "White Woods" monster. If this card is sent to the GY to activate a monster effect: You can Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Woes of the White Woods" once per turn.
